text: Christian Scherer (56 years old in 2018) is a German/French Business executive. Born in Duisburg, Germany, and raised in Toulouse, France, he holds an MBA Degree in international marketing from the University of Ottawa and graduated from the Ecole Supérieure de Commerce de Paris. He started his career in 1984 at Airbus where he was Head of Contracts, Leasing Markets and Deputy Head of Sales as well as Head of Strategy and Future Programmes. At Airbus Defence and Space, he headed Marketing & Sales. He was appointed CEO of ATR in October 2016, and he replaced Eric Schulz as Airbus' Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) on 13 September 2018. ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:Living people Category:French chief executives Category:Airbus people Category:French aerospace engineers Category:École Polytechnique alumni Category:Supaéro alumni Category:People from Duisburg Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
